title: Ep. 14 - We’re all getting dressed today, right? RIGHT???
itunes:title: Ep. 14 - We’re all getting dressed today, right? RIGHT???
description: Word on the street is that a lot of you are finding it difficult to get dressed these days, not because you don’t want to but because you don’t know how after nearly three years of sweat pants and couch living. But it’s time. Even if you move into jeans and a tee, it’s not hard to elevate even the simplest of basics.
